transcript:
Customer: Sabse nipun hai ye.

Hello?
Executive: Hello, Sandhya bol rahi thi IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ji, madam boliye.
Executive: Bataye sir.
Customer: Kya batau?
Executive: Bataye, bataye aapka problem tha na?
Customer: Nahi, problem maine samjha di na.
Executive: Haan, aapne problem samjha diya tha, aapka abhi just call aaya na fir se.
Customer: Nahi, toh aap hi log galat time na karna.
Executive: Sir, aap sunoge meri baat? Sir, aap sun hi nahi rahe ho kuch.
Customer: [unintelligible] Madam, main chup baitha hu.
Executive: Aap mujhe bataye leads mein kya problem aa rahi hai? Main aapse woh puchna chah rahi hu sir.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Leads mein kya problem aa rahi hai? Leads ka batao. Yeh toh aapne mujhe ek lead ka bataya tha, right?
Customer: Hmm hmm hmm hmm.
Executive: Haan ji. Toh abhi aap mujhe bataye.
Customer: Abhi mujhe aap batao sir, services mein jaise leads aap bol rahe ho ki humare ko itne lead chahiye, itni quantity ka chahiye ya fir itna range ka chahiye, woh aap mujhe batao na kaha par kya problem aa rahi hai. Ek ek lead karke hum discuss kar le ek baar? Ki aapki profile pe kya updated hai aur aapko kya required hai, woh cheez hum correct mapping karke theek kar lete hai.

Executive: Aap online aa sakte ho system pe?
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Main aapko video meeting link send kar du?
Customer: Hmm hmm hmm hmm.

Executive: Join kariye aap. Maine just abhi aapko share kara hai.
Customer: Madam, main kuch bol sakta hu?
Executive: Haan haan, bataye sir, bataye.
Customer: Nahi, woh aapne bola tha na fir aap main kuch bolti hu aap pura sunte nahi ho, bolte jaate ho.
Customer: Isliye fir main [unintelligible]
Executive: Nahi nahi, bataye aap.
Customer: Nahi, toh madam abhi video pe toh nahi aa sakta woh video call toh nahi kar sakta woh jo bhi hota hai na aapka presentation wagera woh toh ho nahi sakta. Aur dusri cheez yeh ho sakti hai ki aapko kya dikat, aapko kya jaanna tha? Meri buyleads mein kya dikkat hai? Aapko buyleads, haan. Main batata hu. Main dene mein aap mujhse 10 kilo mangoge, 10 kilo de dunga main. Theek hai. Theek hai. Transportation aapka rahega.
Customer: Aur jo main dikkat aati hai, aapka matlab like jo bhi jo bhi woh samne wali party hogi, samne wali party hogi, uska rahega. Theek hai. Ab woh dikkat yeh hai ki samne wali party pehli baat toh advance payment mein comfortable hoti nahi hai. Theek hai. Theek hai. Aur second thing, jo party comfortable ho bhi jaati hai, toh woh usko transportation ki dikkat aati hai ki transportation kaise hoga. Aur main usko, main usko bata bhi deta hu bhaiya main isse bhej du toh woh bolta hai bhaiya transportation mangna pad raha hai.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Ek minute. Woh petrol le aao na, diesel le aao na. Papa se le lena. Aapke paas hai kya abhi aapki game mein? Nahi, papa se le lena aap. Accha.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji sir.
Customer: Madam, aur kya batau iske alawa? Like woh samne wali party, samne wali party comfortable nahi hoti hai advance payment mein. Aur ek cheez batau, mere se na beech mein ek party, ek party convert bhi ho gayi thi transportation ke liye tayar thi. End moment mein pata hai kya boli? Aap mujhe delivery de do, delivery ke baad aap yaha par aa jaoge main uske baad payment kar dunga. Aur main IndiaMART mein aapke manager se bol raha hu us party ke bare mein toh aapki party bol rahi hai toh aapka manager bolta hai sir hum usme kya kar sakte hai?
Customer: Aap nahi guarantee le rahe ho.
Executive: Hum usme kya kar sakte hai, yeh aapko kisne bola?
Customer: Us time pe jo bhi mera, jo us time pe jo bhi woh scene Utkarsh se baat kari thi, Utkarsh ne uske senior manager se baat karai thi.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Aur uske manager ne bola tha sir isme ab hum kya kar sakte hai?
Executive: Main problem aapke saath kya hai? Aapko main ek cheez pehle clear kar deti hu. Aap jo bhi IndiaMART ka buyleads consume karte ho, chahe lead pe ya direct call pe baat bhi kar rahe ho na, thoda aap actively use karna start karo aur kyunki aapke na jaise aap.
Customer: Madam, aap meri problem hi nahi samajh rahe ho. Ek energy hoti hai subah subah. Aapne kabhi notice kara hoga aap, aap abhi shayad se kisi society mein rehte hoge lekin agar aap thoda sa agar purane samay mein gaon mein toh agar aap kahi pe rehte the ya aap abhi bhi Sarojini wagera jaate hoge, right? Kabhi na kabhi toh gaye hoge aapke Delhi mein. Hai na? Toh waha pe aap kisi bhi dukan pe agar subah subah jaate ho toh subah subah kya bolti, subah subah dukan ka malik kya bolta hai? Ki yaar aaj toh wohi ni batta karna ab toh, ab toh, ab toh le jao chalo. Theek hai? Subah subah, samajh rahe ho?
Executive: Haan ji. Customer: Wohi ni batte ka naam suna hai na aapne? Yaar thoda toh bolo yaar. Hai na? Aap, aap Sharma ho, aapka, aapke ghar mein koi na koi toh family mein business karta hoga. Woh khud bolta hai subah subah dimag nahi kharab hona chahiye. Ab subah subah agar main paanch saat buyleads ek saath use kar raha hu aur woh paanch saat mein hitashi ho rahi hai toh fir aadmi ka dimag kharab nahi hoga kya? Mere ko is baat ka jawab de do na. But sir. Aur uske baad aur uske baad mera manager kaisa hai? Manager is duniya ka sabse matlab madam aap ek, aapne, agar aapka, aap female ho is chakkar mein kuch bol nahi pa raha hu. Woh Sarthak se puchna, Sarthak kya naam hai? Sarthak ke naam se tha na last chalega. Sanskar tha kya tha? Sarthak tha na? Sanskar se puchna. Usko pura jhad diya maine. Hmm. Woh manager aisa hai. Woh manager, humare yaha pe zuban ki kimat hoti hai. Humare area mein na matlab like humare dhandhe mein zuban ki kimat hoti hai. Maine bol diya bhai main aaj tere ko 40 rupay mein soybean dunga, sorted. Hai na? Toh bhale, bhale hi bhav, bhale hi bhav 45 rupay ho jaye main usko 40 mein dene ka, main usko 40 mein dunga. UP mein bolu main tere ko maal nahi bhar raha. UP nahi bol sakta usko. Ab baat aisi iske wajah se udhar main udhar usko bol raha hu Utkarsh ko bhaiya aisi aisi baat hai toh woh bhai bol raha hai ki yaar aap mere manager se, toh main manager se bola. Manager bole sir isme toh hum kuch nahi kar sakte. Aapko aapki risk pe bhejna padega. Bola bhai main 400 rupay quintal ka bhada like 4 rupees kilo hai na 400 rupay quintal ka bhada laga ke main yaha se Chennai bheju woh maal aur waha pe aake kya bharosa woh nahi, woh nahi utare. Wapis lane ka 400 ka bhada hai nahi 800 ka bhada ho gaya woh. 8 rupees per kg aur woh 40 ton mang raha tha. Hmm. 8 * 4 = 32, 3 lakh 20 hazaar rupay main meri jeb se bhugatta bhade ke? Nahi nahi sir, aise toh nahi hota hai. Matlab aapko deal karna. Are madam, madam meri baat suno, madam meri baat suno. Advance payment aadmi kyun leta hai? Main, main bol raha hu, main saaf bol raha hu chalo main mere yaha se mujhe, mujhe 80, mujhe 100% payment advance chahiye nahi. Mujhe 20% payment sirf is baat ke liye dila do ki aap palat nahi sakte. Like ek token amount dila do aur uske baad main sara, main jo bhi aapka maal hai woh sara LR pe, main sara LR bhej kar dunga. Ki aap gaadi lagao aapki ya meri gaadi bhi lagegi main aapko gaadi ki video bhej dunga. Aise sir aapke saath mein bhej dena. Gaadi mein load hote hi aap mere ko payment dal dena aur bol do. Aap maal aake inspection kar lena agar mere maal mein dikkat hui toh aapko payment refund kar dunga. Agar aapne bola nahi bhaiya mere ko maal hi nahi chahiye toh fir payment refund nahi karunga. Sir, aap dekhiye thoda main aapko ek cheez mein help kar deti hu. Sabse pehle koi bhi lead agar aap consume kar rahe ho aur aapka confirmation ho raha hai lead ke saath toh aap unko apne terms and conditions aap pehle hi rakhte hai, right? Madam, main sab cheeze pehle bata chuka tha. Haan. Terms and conditions. Maine unko bol diya tha payment maine, mere ko sirf yeh cheez chahiye ki jo delivery hai woh delivery mostly aap delivery samne wala, samne wali party hi dekhe taaki kya usko dikkat nahi ho aur na hi mere ko dikkat ho baar baar party woh baar baar bhada dhundhne mein. Hai na? Aur baki woh log payment sirf 20% advance chahiye aur baki ka 80% LR bhej diye mujhe. Hmm. Aur mujhe toh payment wagera advance chahiye agar woh meri line ka aadmi hua aur woh routine wala hua aur like woh agar mere jo brokers hai unse unke contact mein raha woh toh mujhe payment bhi advance nahi chahiye. Mujhe payment bhi advance nahi chahiye agar woh meri line ka aadmi hua toh. Main aapki baat samajh gayi sir. But aapko bhi thoda sa na buyers ko jab aap discussion kar rahe ho, right? Kyunki online hai sir toh online pe bhi aapko thoda sa na rakhna rahega ki aap customers ko kaise treat kar rahe ho, kaise kya kar rahe ho. Kyunki online mein aap dekh pa rahe ho na ki woh aapko dekh pa raha hai. Toh thoda sa cheeze toh rehta hi rehta hai. Main itna bol sakta hu aap mujhse bolo, nahi nahi aap mujhse bologe na aap mere jitne bhi main jitni bhi buyleads mein jisse baat, accha ek pata hai ek aur dikkat kya aati hai? Main for example kisi ko call lagata hu buylead use karke aur samne se answer aata hai bhaiya mere ko toh bechni chahiye. Accha, aisa buyer unka woh aa raha hai aisa seller ki mere ko bechna hai. Haan. Theek hai. Aur yeh saare problem aapke pehle address nahi hue the kya sir? Madam, main kya bol raha hu mere ko bas aap Utkarsh ke apne number save nahi kar rakhe hai. Aap mujhe Utkarsh ke number bhej do. Mere na kuch business purpose se saare call record rehte hai. Hai na? Main sabki recording bhej dunga aap aaram se baith ke sunna. Theek hai. Nahi, koi issue nahi hai sir. Main yaha se aapka services ek baar take care karwati hu proper team se hi aur aapko jo bhi rehta hai aapke saath mein. Nahi, aap usko meri baat toh suno. Aaram se ek baar, aap ek baar na aaram se kisi din agar jaise aapka mood wood kharab ho na toh baith ke woh sunna aur baith ke na mani man fir Utkarsh ko gaali de dena. Toh aapka mood bhi sahi hoga aur meri, meri baat bhi sun loge. Main normal bhi sun lungi sir aapki baat. Nahi, meri baat aise nahi woh thode se woh usme curse words bhi hai isliye bol raha hu. Woh usne kya hai last baar mera dimag kharab kar diya tha Utkarsh ne. Koi problem nahi hai sir. Piche jo hua hai abhi aap usko na hi matlab usko aap thoda sa side mein rakhte hai hum. Services mein dekhte hai kaise main aapko help kar sakti hu, leads mein, enquiries mein. Theek hai? Ji. Ek baar main pura catalog aapka check karti hu kaha par kya cheez ka requirement hai kyunki agar main score ki baat karu aapka catalog quality that is 50% hi ho rakha hai bas. Toh kaha par kya missing hai kya hume? Matlab 50% matlab aapke product ke photos nahi hai saare. Description mention nahi hai ya required hai. Madam, photos ki dikkat pata hai kya hai? Madam, actually photos ki dikkat aisi hai ki photo photo aap Google se nikaalo na. Sir, Google se photos nahi nikaal sakte hai hum. Usme aapka hi copyright aa jayega na company ka toh fir koi fayda nahi hai na us cheez ka. Screenshot maar lo. Photos ke liye main aapse discussion kar lungi sir. Theek hai? Aur toh kuch nahi hai na madam ek toh please aap samajh ek request hai madam sirf do request hai. Ek nahi do hai ki ek toh buyleads bilkul genuine hai aur dusra mera account manager aap please wohi dena jo April tak tik jaye jisme potential ho mera gussa handle, mera gussa toh aise main karunga hi nahi. Uske kya jo jo dimag se dimag se pedal hote hai na fir unko gussa aata hai. Samajh gayi. Baki main toh bahut prem se baat karta hu. Toh mere ko na account manager bas woh dena jo end tak rahe. Theek hai. Yeh beech beech mein yeh kya yeh change hota hai na fir jaise aapko main aaj pura samjha diya ab mere ko pata hai shuruwat mein aapko gussa aa raha tha. Kyunki main usko samjha chuka hu Sarthak ko aur Sarthak ko samjhane ke baad ab wapis aapko baith ke samjhao. Mujhe samjhane samjhane mein. Wapis samjhane ki requirement nahi aayegi sir ab kisi ko bhi. Main khud hi aapka personally ek baar. Are madam, yeh cheez mere ko, yeh cheez mere ko aapke yaha se pata nahi kitne logo ne boli hai. Including Utkarsh. Koi problem nahi hai sir. Main solution aapko karke deti hu iska. Theek hai? Madam, including Utkarsh kitni baar bol Utkarsh ko samjha di. Kal parso woh aaya tha Sarthak usko samjha di. Isse pehle ek aur, ek aur koi aapki senior manager thi usko samjha di. Sabko samjha uske baad fir nikalta kuch result kuch nikalta nahi hai. Maine aapko bola sir agar main aapko yeh cheez bol rahi hu toh aapka kuch fruitful hi hoga. Aap disappoint nahi hoge IndiaMART se. Theek hai? Main aapko help karti hu services ko lekar jaise jaise bhi hota hai waise main aapko help kar deti hu. Okay madam. Theek hai? Kab tak aa jayega aapka reply? Koi issue hota hai aap mujhe direct number pe contact karna. Aap mujhe aaj aur kal ka time dijiye Thursday main aapko contact karti hu sir. Main ek baar pura catalog aapka go through kar deti hu. Thursday ko hoga kya mere saath mere ko yeh cheez samjhao. Thoda sa sir services se related hum leads wagera mein baat karte hai na kaha par kya main problem aa rahi hai. Theek hai. Phone hi nahi utha rahe, phone nahi utha rahe. Toh woh main ek baar check karwa deti hu. Ek baar main fruitful jo bhi solution ho sakta hai buyleads mein ki hum aapko kitna IndiaMART pe kitne relevant buyleads generate ho rahi hai kya ho raha hai woh main ek baar check karwa deti hu. Theek hai? Theek hai madam. Aap tak kitna pahuch raha hai ya aap tak pahuch bhi raha hai ya nahi pahuch raha hai woh sara cheeze check karke Thursday mein aapse ek baar connect karti hu. Sorry? Aap tak woh lead pahuch rahi hai jo genuine leads hai ya nahi pahuch rahi hai woh sara cheeze main ek baar check karke aapko fir Thursday connect karti hu. Theek hai? Theek hai madam. Thursday fir kis time pe call back kar lu sir? Thursday aap mere ko message dal dena main jab bhi free hunga main kar dunga. Theek hai sir, no problem. Theek hai madam. Aapka yeh
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer facing issues with buyleads.

- Customer facing issues with advance payments.

- Customer facing issues with transportation.

- Customer facing issues with account manager.

- Customer facing issues with Utkarsh.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to resolve the issues.

- Executive will check the catalog quality.

- Executive will connect on Thursday.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back on Thursday.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, payment, transportation, account manager, catalog
